title: AI hackers are now beating human hackers, and they are doing it for far less money
description: A Stanford study shows an AI agent outperforming human hackers by finding more security flaws in less time and at a much lower cost.

title: AI will help SP defeat BJP, curb electoral malpractices: Akhilesh Yadav
description: At the Vision India Summit organised by the SP in Hyderabad, on Saturday, Akhilesh said AI technology must be harnessed to strengthen law enforcement and ensure public safety. “We shall make the best use of AI in curbing electoral malpractices in the next assembly elections in UP,” he said.

title: A watchful eye: Cameras, drones and AI help Lima-area law enforcement amidst privacy concerns

title: C3.ai Just Scored a Government Win. Should You Buy the Beaten-Down AI Stock Now?

title: Jim Cramer on Cisco: “This Company’s at the Heart of the AI Revolution”
